queries_list.member: SELECT "Address".*, "Client".*, "Member".* from "Address" JOIN "Client" on ("Address"."AddressId" = "Client"."AddressId") JOIN "Member" on ("Client"."ClientId" = "Member"."ClientId") and "Member"."UserName" in ('{}')
queries_list.membertheme: SELECT * from "MemberTheme" where "Id" in (SELECT "Theme" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}'))
queries_list.sensor: (WITH RECURSIVE "SensorList" AS (SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" where "Sensor"."SensorId" in (SELECT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" JOIN "MemberSensor" ON "MemberSensor"."SensorId" = "Sensor"."SensorId" AND "MemberId" in (SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}'))) UNION ALL SELECT d.*FROM "Sensor" AS d JOIN "SensorList" AS sd ON (d."ParentSensorId" = sd."SensorId")) SELECT DISTINCT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" Join "SensorList" on "Sensor"."SensorId" = "SensorList"."SensorId" ORDER BY "SensorId")
queries_list.readingtype_sensorid: SELECT "ReadingTypeId" from "VersionReadingTypes" where "VersionCode" in (SELECT "Version" from "Sensor" where "SensorId" in ({}))
queries_list.alert:
SELECT * from "SensorAlert" where "SensorId" in 
	(WITH RECURSIVE "SensorList" AS 
		(SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" where "Sensor"."SensorId" in 
			(SELECT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" JOIN "MemberSensor" ON "MemberSensor"."SensorId" = "Sensor"."SensorId" AND "MemberId" in
				(SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}')) 
			)
		UNION ALL SELECT d.* FROM "Sensor" AS d JOIN "SensorList" AS sd ON (d."ParentSensorId" = sd."SensorId") -- AND sd."IsBillingSensor" = True)
		)
	SELECT DISTINCT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" Join "SensorList" on "Sensor"."SensorId" = "SensorList"."SensorId" ORDER BY "SensorId"
	)
	ORDER BY "AlertId" ASC
queries_list.event:
SELECT * from "UserDefinedEvents" where "SensorId" in
	(WITH RECURSIVE "SensorList" AS 
		(SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" where "Sensor"."SensorId" in 
			(SELECT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" JOIN "MemberSensor" ON "MemberSensor"."SensorId" = "Sensor"."SensorId" AND "MemberId" in
				(SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}')) 
			)
		UNION ALL SELECT d.* FROM "Sensor" AS d JOIN "SensorList" AS sd ON (d."ParentSensorId" = sd."SensorId") -- AND sd."IsBillingSensor" = True)
		)
	SELECT DISTINCT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" Join "SensorList" on "Sensor"."SensorId" = "SensorList"."SensorId" ORDER BY "SensorId"
	)
	ORDER BY "EventId" ASC
queries_list.readingseries:
SELECT SUM("sum"), "TimeStamp" from (
SELECT SUM("ReadingValue"), "TimeStamp" from "ReadingAgg" where "SensorId" in
(SELECT "SensorId" from "Sensor" JOIN "ApplianceType" on ("Sensor"."ApplianceTypeId" = "ApplianceType"."ApplianceTypeId")
	JOIN "ApplianceCategory" on ("ApplianceType"."ApplianceCategoryId" = "ApplianceCategory"."Id") and "ApplianceCategoryId" = 1 and "SensorId" in 
	(WITH RECURSIVE "SensorList" AS 
		(SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" where "Sensor"."SensorId" in 
		(SELECT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" JOIN "MemberSensor" ON "MemberSensor"."SensorId" = "Sensor"."SensorId" AND "MemberId" in
		(SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('intas')))
		UNION ALL SELECT d.* FROM "Sensor" AS d JOIN "SensorList" AS sd ON (d."ParentSensorId" = sd."SensorId" AND sd."Virtual" = True))
	SELECT DISTINCT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" Join "SensorList" on "Sensor"."SensorId" = "SensorList"."SensorId" ORDER BY "SensorId"))
and "TimeStamp">='2017-05-06 00:00:00' and "TimeStamp"<='2017-05-06 23:59:59' and "ReadingTypeId" = {} and "Grain" = 60
GROUP BY "ReadingValue", "TimeStamp"
ORDER BY "TimeStamp" ASC
) "A" GROUP BY "TimeStamp"
queries_list.readingseries_sensorid:
SELECT SUM("sum"), "TimeStamp" from (SELECT SUM("ReadingValue"), "TimeStamp" from "ReadingAgg" where "SensorId" in ({})
and "TimeStamp">='2017-05-06 00:00:00' and "TimeStamp"<='2017-05-06 23:59:59' and "ReadingTypeId" = {} and "Grain" = 60
GROUP BY "ReadingValue", "TimeStamp"
ORDER BY "TimeStamp" ASC
) "A" GROUP BY "TimeStamp"
queries_list.readingdata_sensorid:
SELECT SUM("ReadingValue") from "ReadingAgg" where "SensorId" in ({}) and "TimeStamp">='2017-05-06 00:00:00' and "TimeStamp"<='2017-05-06 23:59:59' and "ReadingTypeId" = 2001 and "Grain" = 60 and "StatsTypeId" in (1)
GROUP BY "ReadingTypeId"
queries_list.readingdata:
SELECT SUM("ReadingValue") from "ReadingAgg" where "SensorId" in 
(SELECT "SensorId" from "Sensor" JOIN "ApplianceType" on ("Sensor"."ApplianceTypeId" = "ApplianceType"."ApplianceTypeId")
	JOIN "ApplianceCategory" on ("ApplianceType"."ApplianceCategoryId" = "ApplianceCategory"."Id") and "SensorId" in 
	(WITH RECURSIVE "SensorList" AS 
		(SELECT "Sensor".* FROM "Sensor" where "Sensor"."SensorId" in 
		(SELECT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" JOIN "MemberSensor" ON "MemberSensor"."SensorId" = "Sensor"."SensorId" AND "MemberId" in
		(SELECT "MemberId" from "Member" where "UserName" in ('{}')))
		UNION ALL SELECT d.* FROM "Sensor" AS d JOIN "SensorList" AS sd ON (d."ParentSensorId" = sd."SensorId" AND sd."Virtual" = True))
	SELECT DISTINCT "Sensor"."SensorId" FROM "Sensor" Join "SensorList" on "Sensor"."SensorId" = "SensorList"."SensorId" ORDER BY "SensorId"))
and "TimeStamp">='2017-05-06 00:00:00' and "TimeStamp"<='2017-05-06 23:59:59' and "ReadingTypeId" = 2001 and "Grain" = 60 and "StatsTypeId" in (1)
GROUP BY "ReadingTypeId"
